Spanish: Estoy buscando un buen libro para leer.
English: I'm looking for a good book to read.

Spanish: Necesito hablar contigo acerca de algo importante.
English: I need to talk to you about something important.
Could you show me where the bathroom is?

Spanish: No me siento muy bien hoy.
English: I'm not feeling very well today.

Spanish: Me gustaría comprar un billete de tren.
English: I would like to buy a train ticket.

Spanish: El clima está muy frío hoy.
English: The weather is very cold today.
What is your name?
I have forgotten my password.
Happy birthday to you!
When is the next meeting?
I love classical music.

Spanish: Por favor, no olvides cerrar la puerta.
English: Please don't forget to close the door.

Spanish: Estoy pensando en cambiar de trabajo.
English: I'm thinking of changing jobs.
Could you help me with these packages?

Spanish: Quisiera un vaso de agua, por favor.
English: I would like a glass of water, please.

Spanish: Tengo una reserva para esta noche.
English: I have a reservation for tonight.
I don't know how to do it.
Where can we exchange the money?

Spanish: Hoy es mi primer día de trabajo.
English: Today is my first day at work.
Could you speak slower, please?

Spanish: Este fin de semana voy a visitar a mi familia.
English: I'm going to visit my family this weekend.
I got lost in the city.

Spanish: No entiendo lo que estás diciendo.
English: I don't understand what you're saying.
Can you recommend a good movie?

Spanish: Vamos a llegar tarde si no nos vamos ahora.
English: We're going to be late if we don't leave now.

Spanish: Me encanta cocinar en mi tiempo libre.
English: I love cooking in my spare time.
I think we should ask for help.
I need to learn how to drive.

Spanish: Estoy un poco preocupado por el examen.
English: I'm a little worried about the exam.
I need to practice my Spanish.
Where can I find a pharmacy?
Can we meet later?
Can you pay attention, please?
I have a headache.
What do you think about this situation?
I miss you a lot.
I haven't finished eating.
How can I get to the airport?
I'm excited for the trip.
I don't have enough money.
I think I'm in love.
The food is too hot.
Can you pass the bread, please?
I need to make a call.
I can't find my keys.

Spanish: Estoy aprendiendo a tocar el piano.
English: I'm learning to play the piano.

Spanish: ¿Te gustaría ir al cine esta noche?
English: Would you like to go to the cinema tonight?
I'm trying to lose weight.
I have to finish this project.
I can't wait to see it.
